tr_quotes.quote: Hedeflediğin insan olmaya çalışmak gerilim, kim olduğunu kabul etmek ise rahatlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İçinde bulunduğumuz durum ne düşündüğümüzün sonucudur. Akıl her şeydir. Düşündüğümüz şey olacağımız şeydir. .
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyden kuşku duyacaksanız, kendi sınırlarınızdan kuşku duyun.
tr_quotes.author: Don Ward

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ancak yüreğiyle bakarsa bir şeyi iyi görür, iyi anlar. Gözler bir şeyin özünü göremez.
Kendini bildiğin gün, gerçek bayramdır.
tr_quotes.author: Şems-i Tebrizi

tr_quotes.quote: Kim olduğunu bilmek ister misin? Sorma. Harekete geç! Eylem seni tarif eder ve tanımlar.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün gerçekten önemli bir şey yapmanın tek yolu, her gün kendini anlamaya çalışmaktan geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

tr_quotes.quote: Kazanan olarak doğmadınız ve kaybeden olarak da doğmadınız. Siz, kendinizi meydana getirdiğiniz şeysiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek kendimiz olduğumuz kişi olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

tr_quotes.quote: Kendin ol; diğer herhangi bir kişi zaten olunmuştur.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Bir orijinal olarak doğdun. Bir kopya olarak ölme.
tr_quotes.author: Jhon Mason

tr_quotes.quote: Neysen o ol. Bu senden daha iyi olmanın ilk adımı.
tr_quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

tr_quotes.quote: Kendiniz olmaya karar verdiğiniz an güzelleşirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

tr_quotes.quote: Nasılsa inanmak istediklerine inanacaklar, o yüzden kendin ol!
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Her daim kendin ol. Sen, seni anlayana mucizesin
tr_quotes.author: Amine Gzat

tr_quotes.quote: Doğal olmak, yetişmesi çok zor bir pozdur.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Bir başkasının ikinci sınıf versiyonu yerine, her zaman kendinizin birinci sınıf versiyonu olun.
tr_quotes.author: Judy Garland

tr_quotes.quote: İç ışığınızı takip edin; deliliği gizleme.
tr_quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

tr_quotes.quote: Vaktiniz sınırlı, bu yüzden başkalarının hayatını yaşayarak israf etmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenin ... olduğun gibi olun ve olmadığınız her şeyi iyi bir lütufla istifa etmeyi öğrenin.
tr_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Evrendeki en güçlü güç, kimliği ile tutarlı bir şekilde yaşayan bir insandır.
tr_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin kendisi olmak ve doğru ya da yanlış olmaktan korkmak, teslim olmanın uyumluluğun kolay korkusundan daha takdire şayandır.
tr_quotes.author: Irving Wallace

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer sözlerimi beğenmiyorsan, dinleme. Eğer görünüşümü beğenmiyorsan, bakma. Yaptıklarımı beğenmiyorsan, kafanı çevir; Bu kadar basit.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendiniz olmak her şeydir. Birini etkilemek istiyorsanız başkası olmayın, sadece kendiniz olun.
tr_quotes.author: Selena Gomez

tr_quotes.quote: Asla sessizliğe boğulma. Asla bir kurban olmana izin verme. Kimsenin hayatınıla ilgili tanımını kabul etme; kendini tanımla.
tr_quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

tr_quotes.quote: Trendlerin içine girmeyin. Modayı kendin yap, ama ne olduğuna, ne giydiğine, nasıl yaşadığına göre ne ifade edeceğine karar ver.
tr_quotes.author: Gianni Versace

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı insanlar yanlış yoldan gittiğini söylüyor, ama kendi tarzınsa sıkıntı yok.
tr_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları kopyalamaya çalışmayın, kendiniz olun. Kusurlarınızda bile, daima size hayran kalacak birileri olacaktır. Orijinal belge olmaya çalışın. Sahtelikten daha kötü bir şey yoktur; sonunda okunamaz hale geliyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize seçici olun, azına razı olanlar azını hakeder!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kendinizi analiz etmek, kendinizi sürekli ve dürüst bir biçimde sınavdan geçirmenizi sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: E. Bingaman

tr_quotes.quote: Kendin ol, kimliğin senin kişiliğin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne olduğunu bilmiyor olsanız bile yaptığınız her şey bir şeyi destekler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İşini yap ve beğenmeleri umrunda değil.
tr_quotes.author: Tina Fey

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı insanlar yanlış yoldan gittiğini söylüyor, ama kendi tarzınsa sıkıntı yok.
tr_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman insanların benden beklediğim gibi olmama fikrini sevdim.
tr_quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

tr_quotes.quote: Asla sessizliğe boğulma. Asla bir kurban olmana izin verme. Kimsenin hayatınıla ilgili tanımını kabul etme; kendini tanımla.
tr_quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

tr_quotes.quote: Nereye giderseniz gidin, tüm kalbinizle gidin.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi eşsiz ruhunuzun enerjisini kullanın.
tr_quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

tr_quotes.quote: Kim olduğunuzu olun ve ne istediğinizi söyleyin, çünkü önemi olmayanlar ve önemsiz olanlar içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Doktor Seuss

tr_quotes.quote: Asla hissettiğin şey için özür dileme. Gerçek olduğum için üzgünüm demek gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek kendimiz olduğumuz kişi olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin kendisi olmak ve doğru ya da yanlış olmaktan korkmak, teslim olmanın uyumluluğun kolay korkusundan daha takdire şayandır.
tr_quotes.author: Irving Wallace

tr_quotes.quote: İç ışığınızı takip edin; deliliği gizleme.
tr_quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

en_quotes.quote: Never apologize for being yourself.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Be yourself. Everyone else is taken.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don’t compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: The reward for conformity is that everyone likes you but yourself.
en_quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

en_quotes.quote: Existence wants you to be you.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
en_quotes.author: André Gide

en_quotes.quote: Some people around you will not understand your journey. They don’t need to; it’s not for them.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: You must not be afraid of your uniqueness and you must care less and less what people think of you.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: No one ever made a difference by being like everyone else.
en_quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: We are the ones we have been waiting for.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: When someone is properly grounded in life, they shouldn’t have to look outside themselves for approval.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Don’t believe you have to be like anybody to be somebody.
en_quotes.author: Nike

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let other people decide who you are.
en_quotes.author: Bob Goff

en_quotes.quote: He who obeys, does not listen to himself.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: You change the world by being yourself.
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: If you desire to make a difference in the world, you must be different from the world.
en_quotes.author: Elaine S. Dalton

en_quotes.quote: What is the seal of liberation? No longer being ashamed in front of oneself.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Don’t chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people – the ones who really belong in your life – will come to you, and stay.
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: When you see a mob doing something, it should make you less likely to do it yourself, not more likely.
en_quotes.author: Paul Graham

en_quotes.quote: A dead thing can go with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it.
en_quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Every man who says frankly and fully what he thinks is so far doing a public service. We should be grateful to him for attacking most unsparingly our most cherished opinions.
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: There’s a point, around the age of twenty, when you have to choose whether to be like everybody else the rest of your life, or to make a virtue of your peculiarities.
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: The world just wants your authentic truth.
en_quotes.author: Gabby Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: Can you remember who you were, before the world told you who you should be?
en_quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

en_quotes.quote: You, being yourself, unknowingly inspire others to be themselves.
en_quotes.author: Mooji

en_quotes.quote: The imitator dooms himself to hopeless mediocrity.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The most important consequence of self-sufficiency is freedom.
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: Even if one is neither vain nor self-obsessed, it is so extraordinary to be oneself – exactly oneself and no one else.
en_quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

en_quotes.quote: Can you live completely without ambition, completely without ever comparing yourself with another?
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
en_quotes.author: Henri Bergson

en_quotes.quote: Do not live to satisfy the expectations of others.
en_quotes.author: Ichiro Kishimi

en_quotes.quote: Be nobody’s darling; Be an outcast. Take the contradictions of your life and wrap around you like a shawl, to parry stones, to keep you warm.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: When you walk the walk, whether successful or not, you feel more indifferent and robust to people’s opinion, freer, more real.
en_quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

en_quotes.quote: Large groups are no place for smart people.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Just stick to your principles. And rest assured that, if you remain true to them, the same people who made fun of you will come to admire you.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: A rebel is the one who lives totally according to his own light and risks everything else for his ultimate value of freedom.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform (or pause and reflect).
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
en_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

en_quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Success isn’t about how your life looks to others. It’s about how it feels to you. That’s what it means to be true to yourself.
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: What makes you different or weird, that’s your strength.
en_quotes.author: Meryl Streep

en_quotes.quote: All I want to do is be more like me and be less like you.
en_quotes.author: Linkin Park

en_quotes.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody’s praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
en_quotes.author: Mozart

en_quotes.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: This above all: to thine own self be true.
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Subservience of any kind is death to the spirit.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Listen and be open, but don’t let anybody tell you who you are.
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.
en_quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

en_quotes.quote: My philosophy is: It’s none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
en_quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: One must know oneself. Even if it does not help in finding truth, at least it helps in running one’s life, and nothing is more proper.
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: You were born God’s original. Try not to become someone’s copy.
en_quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

en_quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
en_quotes.author: E. E Cummings

en_quotes.quote: I wore black because I liked it. I still do, and wearing it still means something to me. It’s still my symbol of rebellion – against a stagnant status quo, against our hypocritical houses of God, against people whose minds are closed to others’ ideas.
en_quotes.author: Johnny Cash

en_quotes.quote: I would rather die having spoken in my manner, than speak in your manner and live.
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Not till we have lost the world do we begin to find ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The superior man follows nobody else’s path.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Become who you are.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Conformity gets you nowhere.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: Spontaneity is total sincerity.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Our own life has to be our message.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: I’d rather be a freak than a clone.
en_quotes.author: Joanne Harris

en_quotes.quote: Intuition is allergic to conformity.
en_quotes.author: Bill Masur

en_quotes.quote: Appear as you are, be as you appear.
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: It is a waste of energy to follow anybody.
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Stop letting the world keep score for you.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: Train yourself to take nothing personally.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: You are who you are when nobody’s watching.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Fry

en_quotes.quote: What the world craves is authenticity.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Curiosity is insubordination in its purest form.
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

en_quotes.quote: Do not commit to any side or cause but yourself.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: To lead others, one must find one’s own direction.
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: You are what existence wants you to be. Just relax.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Bet on yourself.
en_quotes.author: Anthony Pompliano

en_quotes.quote: We have to wake up. We have to refuse to be a clone.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don’t hide the madness.
en_quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

en_quotes.quote: Let go of who you think you’re supposed to be; embrace who you are.
en_quotes.author: Brené Brown

en_quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable.
en_quotes.author: Conor McGregor

en_quotes.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: In order to stand out, we have to know what we stand for.
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: So whatever you want to do, just do it…Making a damn fool of yourself is absolutely essential.
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Accept right now that you are magnificent. Being your real, true, authentic self is what’s most awesome about you.
en_quotes.author: Gabby Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: Keep being yourself inside you. Keep visualizing what you are aiming for in life. Be patient and know that you will get what you want one day.
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: It has often been said that a reformation should begin with each man reforming himself.
en_quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: This next level will require you to be okay with people not liking you. A person who is okay with not being liked is a powerful person.
en_quotes.author: Inner Practitioner

en_quotes.quote: You must always be prepared to place a bet on yourself, on your future, by heading in a direction that others seem to fear.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: You want to be uncommon amongst uncommon people. Period.
en_quotes.author: David Goggins

en_quotes.quote: You eliminate competition by being yourself.
en_quotes.author: Dan Go

en_quotes.quote: The most contrarian thing of all is not to oppose the crowd but to think for yourself.
en_quotes.author: Peter Thiel

en_quotes.quote: If you can see your path laid out in front of you step by step, you know it’s not your path. Your own path you make with every step you take. That’s why it’s your path.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: When you are in your own lane there is no traffic.
en_quotes.author: Ashley France

en_quotes.quote: Stop caring about impact and just be the best version of you possible – then you’ll naturally have an impact.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Better to be rejected for who you are than accepted for who you’re not.
en_quotes.author: Ed Latimore

en_quotes.quote: I’m going to do what I want to do. I’m going to be who I really am. And I’m going to figure out what that is.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

en_quotes.quote: Find your place on the planet. Dig in, and take responsibility from there.
en_quotes.author: Gary Snyder

en_quotes.quote: You create yourself moment to moment. You are not born as a fixed entity, but only as a infinite potentiality.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: I teach you rebellion! Come out of the masses. Stand alone like a lion and live your life according to your own light.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: You should never sacrifice what you could be for what you are.
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Only dead fish go with the flow.
en_quotes.author: Derek Sivers

en_quotes.quote: Be the person your dog thinks you are.
en_quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

en_quotes.quote: I’m not confused. I’m just well mixed.
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: This isn’t life in the fast lane, it’s life in the oncoming traffic.
en_quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: It’s hard to be a diamond in a rhinestone world.
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: If you don’t say what you think then you kill your unborn self.
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you.
en_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

en_quotes.quote: To be authentic is to be at peace with our imperfections.
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: If you worry about your reputation you don’t deserve to have one.
en_quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

en_quotes.quote: The simplest means of procuring protection from other men is security of quiet solitude and withdrawal from the mass of people.
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: Only those who can accept their own annihilation can have the courage to be true individuals.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: The worst thing that can happen to a man is to become civilized.
en_quotes.author: David Goggins

en_quotes.quote: If you don’t set your own values, other people will.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: The effect of life in society is to complicate and confuse our existence, making us forget who we really are by causing us to become obsessed with what we are not.
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is yet in its true form.
en_quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Humans are born free, but habituated by society to obey by default. Flex your freedom muscle by questioning instead of blindly following authority.
en_quotes.author: Justin Kan

en_quotes.quote: The world is so busy telling us who we should be, that we forget who we are.
en_quotes.author: Bill Masur

en_quotes.quote: The more labels you have for yourself, the dumber they make you.
en_quotes.author: Paul Graham

en_quotes.quote: You cannot accept others as they are if you don’t accept yourself as you are.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: It’s a simple fact of life: if you want to do something incredible, something that makes you stand out above the rest, then you have to become comfortable being different–that means being misunderstood, criticized, even hated.
en_quotes.author: Mark Manson

en_quotes.quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

en_quotes.quote: The tighter you cling to your current identity, the harder it becomes to grow beyond it.
en_quotes.author: James Clear

en_quotes.quote: To become what one is, one must not have the faintest idea what one is.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Society tames the wolf into a dog. And man is the most domesticated animal of all.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Consult your conscience; rather than popular opinion.
en_quotes.author: Publius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: One has to be a teacher to oneself and a disciple of oneself; there is no authority, there is only understanding.
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at anytime and be yourself.
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: If you know your being, there is no question of becoming. All that you could have ever imagined to become you already are.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Man has to create himself. He is not ready-made, he is not given. And the creation has to be a self-creation – nobody else can make you.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Remember: no attachment should grow, no clinging should grow. They are all against your independence, your freedom, your individuality.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Just keep coming home to yourself. You are the one you’ve been waiting for.
en_quotes.author: Byron Katie

en_quotes.quote: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence.
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: I have no responsibility to live up to what others expect of me. That’s their mistake, not my failing.
en_quotes.author: Richard Feynman

en_quotes.quote: Cherish that which is within you, and shut off that which is without.
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: Exercise authority over yourself, or you will be made to bow to the authority of others. Be your own lord and master.
Observe things as they are and don’t pay attention to other people.
en_quotes.author: Huang Po

en_quotes.quote: He who tries to shine dims his own light. He who defines himself can’t know who he really is.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Waking up to who you are requires letting go of who you imagine yourself to be.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Be yourself, don’t take anything from anyone, and never let them take you alive.
en_quotes.author: Gerard Way

en_quotes.quote: Don’t worry what people say or what people think. Be yourself.
en_quotes.author: Brett Hull

en_quotes.quote: Don’t compromise yourself – you’re all you have.
en_quotes.author: John Grisham

en_quotes.quote: Don’t try to impress people. Always be yourself!
en_quotes.author: Bella Thorne

en_quotes.quote: To shine your brightest light is to be who you truly are.
en_quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

en_quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don’t compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: There is only one you for all time. Fearlessly be yourself.
en_quotes.author: Anthony Rapp

en_quotes.quote: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
en_quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

en_quotes.quote: No other version, no matter how perfect it is, would ever feel better than being your true self.
en_quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

en_quotes.quote: Be who you were created to be, and you will set the world on fire.
en_quotes.author: St. Catherine of Sienna

en_quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else’s opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: You wouldn’t worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself and not a second-rate version of someone else.
en_quotes.author: Judy Garland

en_quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: Say what you feel. It’s not being rude, it’s called being real.
We are so accustomed to disguise ourselves to others that in the end we become disguised to ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
en_quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare
